alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 727 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort McCoy to near Lake George. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Springs, Lake Delancy and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam
